analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#159-161) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#258-296)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#374-397)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#467-482)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#486-505)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#568-572) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#307-327):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#323-324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#324-325)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#614-629) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#628)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#535) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#579-583)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#568-572)
	- /unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#571

ERC20Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#14-16)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x06d3c687d94a6b15076fbbaff1ca73e3a674b402.sol#130-131)
